description:
Revo Uninstaller helps you to uninstall software and remove unwanted programs easily.

Revo Uninstaller Free helps you to uninstall software and remove unwanted programs easily. Remove all uninstall leftovers and traces.
- Added – Revo Uninstaller Helper (only for installable version)
- Improved – Scanning algorithms for leftovers
- Fixed minor bugs
- Updated language files
- Removed Windows XP support
